meanings.definition: Payment of an amount greater than what is due.
meanings.sent1: The company issued overpayments to its employees by mistake.
meanings.sent2: She received overpayments for her work and had to return the extra money.
meanings.sent3: The overpayments made everyone laugh because they were so unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a river of overpayments, always giving more than required.
meanings.sent5: The overpayments stood out like a bright light in the dark room of finances.
